SELECT t.team_id, t.team_name, t.team_intro, t.team_start, u.user_id, tmp.team_part, u.user_profile, rp.recruit_hits rs.required_skill_1, rs.required_skill_2, rs.required_skill_3, rs.required_skill_4, rs.required_skill_5, rs.required_skill_6, rs.required_skill_7, r s.required_skill_8, rs.required_skill_9, rs.required_skill_10
FROM team t, manage_team_part mtp, required_skill rs, user u, recruit_team rt, recruit_project rp
WHERE t.team_id = rp.team_id and t.team_id = mtp.team_id and t.team_id = rs.team_id
ORDER BY DESC team_start
